languages.text: "Я постараюсь отыскать в них важные уроки, стать лучше и тем оправдать его наследие перед Императором". {n}Эвейн печально склоняет голову.{/n} "К разговору о наследии — эта вещь принадлежала Каллигосу. Она сотворена для войны, но я не желаю держать в руках нечто подобное. Быть может, она послужит в походе тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Я постараюсь отыскать в них важные уроки, стать лучше и тем оправдать его наследие перед Императором". {n}Эвейн печально склоняет голову.{/n} "К разговору о наследии — эта вещь принадлежала Каллигосу. Она сотворена для войны, но я не желаю держать в руках нечто подобное. Быть может, она послужит в походе тебе".

languages.text: "I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."
languages.original_text: "Я постараюсь отыскать в них важные уроки, стать лучше и тем оправдать его наследие перед Императором". {n}Эвейн печально склоняет голову.{/n} "К разговору о наследии — эта вещь принадлежала Каллигосу. Она сотворена для войны, но я не желаю держать в руках нечто подобное. Быть может, она послужит в походе тебе".

traits.locale_text: "I will strive to find important lessons in them so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this item used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

"I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

"I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

languages.text: «Me esforzaré por hallar alguna lección importante en ellos, para así obrar con mayor rectitud y redimir su legado a ojos del Emperador». {n}Evayne inclina la cabeza apesadumbrado.{/n} «Y hablando de legado, esto pertenecía a Calligos. Se creó para la guerra, pero no albergo el más mínimo deseo de empuñarla. Quizá le resulte de utilidad en su campaña».
languages.original_text: "I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: «Me esforzaré por hallar alguna lección importante en ellos, para así obrar con mayor rectitud y redimir su legado a ojos del Emperador». {n}Evayne inclina la cabeza apesadumbrado.{/n} «Y hablando de legado, esto pertenecía a Calligos. Se creó para la guerra, pero no albergo el más mínimo deseo de empuñarla. Quizá le resulte de utilidad en su campaña».

languages.text: “我会努力从中吸取重要的教训。这样我就可以变得更加优秀，在帝皇的见证下拯救他的遗产。”{n}艾维尼悲伤地低下了头。{/n}“说到遗产，这是卡里戈斯的遗物，是为战争而生的，但我并不打算留着它，也不打算留着其他类似的东西。或许，这件遗物会在您接下来的战斗中发挥作用。”
languages.original_text: "I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: “我会努力从中吸取重要的教训。这样我就可以变得更加优秀，在帝皇的见证下拯救他的遗产。”{n}艾维尼悲伤地低下了头。{/n}“说到遗产，这是卡里戈斯的遗物，是为战争而生的，但我并不打算留着它，也不打算留着其他类似的东西。或许，这件遗物会在您接下来的战斗中发挥作用。”

languages.text: « Je m'efforcerai d'en tirer des leçons qui me permettront de devenir meilleur que lui et, ainsi, de racheter son héritage aux yeux de l'Empereur, {n}déclare Evayne en penchant la tête d'un air triste.{/n} À ce propos, ceci appartenait à Calligos. C'est une arme de guerre, mais je n'ai aucune envie de brandir ce genre de choses. Peut-être vous sera-t-elle utile au cours de votre campagne ? »
languages.original_text: "I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'efforcerai d'en tirer des leçons qui me permettront de devenir meilleur que lui et, ainsi, de racheter son héritage aux yeux de l'Empereur, {n}déclare Evayne en penchant la tête d'un air triste.{/n} À ce propos, ceci appartenait à Calligos. C'est une arme de guerre, mais je n'ai aucune envie de brandir ce genre de choses. Peut-être vous sera-t-elle utile au cours de votre campagne ? »

languages.text: 「私はその中に重要な教訓を見いだすよう尽力しよう。そうすれば、力をつけ、皇帝の目に彼の遺産を取り戻すことができるだろう」{n}エヴァインは悲しそうに頭を下げた。{/n}「遺産といえば、これはカリゴスのものだった。戦争用に作られたものだが、私はこれを使いたいとは思わない。もしかしたら、あなたの作戦に役立つかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: 「私はその中に重要な教訓を見いだすよう尽力しよう。そうすれば、力をつけ、皇帝の目に彼の遺産を取り戻すことができるだろう」{n}エヴァインは悲しそうに頭を下げた。{/n}「遺産といえば、これはカリゴスのものだった。戦争用に作られたものだが、私はこれを使いたいとは思わない。もしかしたら、あなたの作戦に役立つかもしれない」

languages.text: "Ich werde mich bemühen, wichtige Lektionen darin zu erkennen, auf dass ich mich persönlich weiterentwickeln und so sein Vermächtnis in den Augen des Imperators einlösen kann." {n}Evayne neigt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Apropos Vermächtnis, dies gehörte Calligos. Sie wurde für den Krieg gefertigt, doch ich verspüre nicht den Wunsch, sie oder etwas ähnliches je zu führen. Vielleicht könnt Ihr sie bei Eurem Feldzug gebrauchen."
languages.original_text: "I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mich bemühen, wichtige Lektionen darin zu erkennen, auf dass ich mich persönlich weiterentwickeln und so sein Vermächtnis in den Augen des Imperators einlösen kann." {n}Evayne neigt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Apropos Vermächtnis, dies gehörte Calligos. Sie wurde für den Krieg gefertigt, doch ich verspüre nicht den Wunsch, sie oder etwas ähnliches je zu führen. Vielleicht könnt Ihr sie bei Eurem Feldzug gebrauchen."

languages.text: "Onlardan önemli dersler edinip kulağıma küpe edeceğim ki daha iyi bir hâle gelip İmparator'un gözünde onun mirasını koruyabileyim." {n}Evayne, üzgün bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Miras demişken, bu eskiden Calligos'a aitti. Savaş için yapılmıştı ama onu ya da benzerini kullanmaya niyetim yok. Belki seferinizde size yardımcı olur."
languages.original_text: "I shall strive to find important lessons in them, so that I may become better and thus redeem his legacy in the Emperor's eyes." {n}Evayne bows his head in sadness.{/n} "Speaking of legacy, this used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

Savaş için yapılmıştı ama onu ya da benzerini kullanmaya niyetim yok. Belki seferinizde size yardımcı olur."
